title: 151: Getting Blue Balled with Bradley Martyn
itunes:title: Getting Blue Balled with Bradley Martyn
description:
The boys are joined by podcaster, youtuber, all-around buff guy Bradley Martyn for a wild ride of a conversation about starting an Onlyfans, getting footjobs in Costa Rica, and what it's like to be super strong with a hog. They also riff on rub n' tugs and help a listener who can't stop jerkin' it. SCIENCE.
